description: Runs a language model given a specified provider.

input_value.info: The input text to send to the model

system_message.info: A system message that helps set the behavior of the assistant
system_message.o1_not_supported: System messages are not supported by o1 reasoning models

info.reasoning_model_no_temperature: Reasoning model '{model}' does not support temperature parameter

errors.openai_api_key_required: OpenAI API key is required when using OpenAI provider
errors.anthropic_api_key_required: Anthropic API key is required when using Anthropic provider
errors.google_api_key_required: Google API key is required when using Google provider
